title: ICE assertion failed: self.is_struct() || self.is_union()

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code code from `./src/test/ui/async-await/issues/issue-64433.rs` ```Rust #[derive(Debug)] struct A<'a> { inner: Vec<&'a str>, } struct B {} impl B { async fn something_with_a(&mut self, a: A<'_>) -> Result<(), String> { println!("{:?}", a); Ok(()) } } async fn can_error(some_string: &str) -> Result<(), String> { let a = A { inner: vec![some_string, "foo"] }; let mut b = B {}; Ok(b.something_with_a(a).await.map(drop)?) } fn main() { } ``` ### Meta repo @ f7cbb7a594658099ebb9d0008779511fe2fbe9ab ### Error output `rustc ./src/test/ui/async-await/issues/issue-64433.rs` ``` error[E0670]: `async fn` is not permitted in the 2015 edition --> ./src/test/ui/async-await/issues/issue-64433.rs:17:5 | 17 | async fn something_with_a(&mut self, a: A<'_>) -> Result<(), String> { | ^^^^^ to use `async fn`, switch to Rust 2018 | = help: set `edition = "2018"` in `Cargo.toml` = note: for more on editions, read https://doc.rust-lang.org/edition-guide error[E0670]: `async fn` is not permitted in the 2015 edition --> ./src/test/ui/async-await/issues/issue-64433.rs:23:1 | 23 | async fn can_error(some_string: &str) -> Result<(), String> { | ^^^^^ to use `async fn`, switch to Rust 2018 | = help: set `edition = "2018"` in `Cargo.toml` = note: for more on editions, read https://doc.rust-lang.org/edition-guide thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: self.is_struct() || self.is_union()', src/librustc_middle/ty/mod.rs:2462:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.47.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu error: aborting due to 2 previous errors For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0670`. ```
Backtrace
